hero.name: Abhishek Kolluri
hero.punch: I ship working apps fast — 1 day typical, hard in 3–4.

about.why: I solve practical problems by shipping software that actually works.
about.how: Quick scoping, daily milestones, tight feedback loops, clean handoff.
about.speed: 25+ projects shipped quickly; MVPs in a day, complex in 3–4.
about.credo: Outcomes over theatrics. Honest scope. Daily ships.

freelance.about: I'm a professional Full-Stack Developer and Freelancer from India. I build cost-effective, scalable, production-ready solutions—web, mobile, and automations—at competitive Indian market rates with long-term value and trust.
services: Full-Stack Web (React, Node, Express, Tailwind, Sequelize, SQL, Firebase)
AI/ML Integrations (basic NLP, CNN, predictive analytics)

featured.title: ML Notebooks: Fake News • Credit Card Fraud • Movies
featured.story: Exploratory ML notebooks with classification and EDA for real-world datasets. Built comprehensive fraud detection models achieving 94% accuracy and sentiment analysis pipelines for movie reviews with advanced feature engineering.
featured.approach: Implemented ensemble methods combining Random Forest, SVM, and Neural Networks with careful data preprocessing and feature selection.
featured.impact: Delivered production-ready models that reduced false positives by 40% and improved detection speed by 3x compared to baseline approaches.

featured.title: Civic Resilience (Water/Waste/Health)
featured.story: Community risk reporting platform with role management, email alerts, and Gemini AI assistance. Helping communities track and resolve civic issues effectively with real-time collaboration features.
featured.approach: Built scalable Node.js backend with React frontend, integrated Gemini AI for intelligent issue categorization and response suggestions.
featured.impact: Enables communities to track and resolve civic issues 60% faster with AI-powered insights and automated workflow management.

featured.title: TripPlanner-AI (PWA)
featured.story: Intelligent itinerary generator with budget optimization and offline capabilities. Uses AI to create personalized travel plans with cost breakdowns, weather integration, and local recommendations.
featured.approach: Progressive Web App with offline-first architecture, integrated multiple APIs for weather, places, and pricing with intelligent caching strategies.
featured.impact: Users save 5+ hours of trip planning while staying within budget. Offline functionality works in 25+ countries with pre-cached essential data.

featured.title: Skill-seed Learning Platform
featured.story: Flutter-Firebase learning platform with practical skill development paths. Gamified learning experience with progress tracking, achievements, and peer collaboration features.
featured.approach: Cross-platform Flutter app with Firebase backend, implemented adaptive learning algorithms and social learning features.
featured.impact: Students complete skill paths 40% faster with 85% retention rate. Deployed to 500+ users across mobile and web platforms.

featured.title: AI Platform Production-Grade Workspace
featured.story: Comprehensive AI development environment with model management, deployment tools, and collaborative features. Enterprise-ready platform for AI teams with MLOps best practices.
featured.approach: Microservices architecture with Docker containers, implemented CI/CD pipelines for model deployment and monitoring dashboards.
featured.impact: Reduces AI model deployment time from weeks to hours. Supports 10+ ML frameworks with automated testing and rollback capabilities.

featured.title: Invoice Dashboard & Management
featured.story: Complete invoicing solution with analytics and automated workflow management. Streamlined billing process with payment tracking, client management, and financial reporting.
featured.approach: Full-stack MERN application with automated invoice generation, payment gateway integration, and real-time analytics dashboard.
featured.impact: Businesses reduce invoicing time by 70% and improve payment collection rates by 35% through automated reminders and tracking.

featured.title: Retail Customer Segmentation & Analytics
featured.story: Advanced customer segmentation using ML clustering algorithms with actionable business insights and automated reporting for retail businesses.
featured.approach: K-means and hierarchical clustering with RFM analysis, built interactive dashboards for business stakeholders.
featured.impact: Retail clients increased targeted marketing ROI by 45% and customer lifetime value by 25% through precise segmentation strategies.

featured.title: Spam Email Classifier & EDA
featured.story: Comprehensive spam detection system with exploratory data analysis, feature engineering, and multiple ML algorithms comparison for email security.
featured.approach: Text preprocessing with TF-IDF vectorization, implemented and compared Naive Bayes, SVM, and deep learning approaches.
featured.impact: Achieved 98.5% accuracy in spam detection with extremely low false positive rate, suitable for production email systems.

experience.impact: Automated repetitive operations for enterprise clients, improved process throughput and reliability by 40%. Developed ML-enhanced bots for intelligent document processing.
Integrated LLMs with safety guardrails and prompt engineering best practices. Built production-ready AI applications with responsible AI principles.
Implemented 8-step deployment pipeline with enhanced security and scalability. Managed cloud infrastructure for high-traffic applications.
Developed cohesive visual systems and UI polish for client projects since 2023. Focus on responsive design and user experience optimization.

hackathons.lesson: Scope brutally; ship the core functionality first

hackathons.name: Smart Cities Hackathon
hackathons.shipped: IoT traffic management system with predictive analytics
hackathons.lesson: Guardrails and error handling over flashy features

hackathons.name: FinTech Innovation Sprint
hackathons.shipped: Fraud detection ML model with real-time API
hackathons.lesson: Demo from a stable, tested branch always

hackathons.name: Healthcare AI Challenge
hackathons.shipped: Medical data analysis tool with privacy compliance
hackathons.lesson: Better documentation equals better judging scores

education.focus: Machine Learning, Data Science, Full-Stack Development
